description: This file defines React components for a customizable dialog/modal UI, utilizing Radix UI primitives and lucide icons, with utility functions for styling.

methods.name: DialogOverlay
methods.description: A React component that renders an overlay for the dialog, with animated fade-in and fade-out effects.

methods.name: DialogContent
methods.description: A React component that renders the main content of the dialog, including a close button with an icon.

methods.name: DialogHeader
methods.description: A React component for the dialog header section, styled with flex layout.

methods.name: DialogFooter
methods.description: A React component for the dialog footer section, styled with flex layout.

methods.name: DialogTitle
methods.description: A React component for the dialog title, styled as a heading.

methods.name: DialogDescription
methods.description: A React component for the dialog description text.
